scripts.travis: npm test && npm run coverage && (<coverage/lcov.info coveralls || true)
scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=development istanbul cover _mocha -- --reporter dot && echo google-chrome coverage/lcov-report/index.html
scripts.prepublishX: (echo '/*!' && <LICENSE sed -e's/^/ * /' | sed -e's/\s+$//' && echo ' */' && browserify -p bundle-collapser/plugin -e lib/arrayChanges -s weknowhow.arrayChanges) > array-changes.js
